Event: You don't have to be a bad person or make bad decisions to think you don't deserve to be happy. Forgive yourself for past mistakes and promise to work towards happiness. Happiness isn't just going to come to you, you need to make it happen by working at it and practicing self-care. Depression can be self-inflicted, so choose to get healthy, start caring, and love those around you. Someone loves you, even if you don't think so, and you deserve to be happy.
Post: "I'm finally coming to terms with the fact that my happiness is in my own hands. No longer will I let past mistakes define me - instead, I'm choosing to work towards a brighter future. It's time to prioritize self-care and surround myself with people who uplift and support me. Depression may have been a part of my journey, but it doesn't define me. I deserve to be happy, and I'm ready to make it happen."
